questions: Can you provide a brief overview of your experience in the Information Technology industry?
What specific skills or technical expertise do you possess that make you a valuable asset in the IT field?
How have you demonstrated your problem-solving abilities in your previous role(s)?
Can you discuss a project or accomplishment that you are particularly proud of from your time in the IT industry?
How do you stay updated on the latest trends and advancements in the IT field?
Have you worked with any specific software or programming languages that are relevant to your role in IT?
How do you approach collaborating with team members or clients on IT projects?
Can you discuss a challenge or obstacle you have faced in your IT career and how you overcame it?
How do you prioritize and manage your tasks effectively in a fast-paced IT environment?
How do you see yourself growing and advancing in your IT career in the future?
